script.message: Listen kid, what you did cost us a lot of damn money alright.
Nothing to say huh? Guess you're too young for some wit.
Anyway anyway, you need to make up for what you did okay. From today youll be preparing some goods for us.
For now get some ammunition ready for my boys, if you cant get it ready... well I'm sure you know
Can't tell if you're stupid or brave kid! Hahaha!
Just mix the SULFUR, NITRATE, and CHARCOAL together in the MIXER to make GUNPOWDER
While you're doing that chuck some METAL into the BULLET MAKER and it'll get some BULLET SHELLS ready for yah.
Fill them up and get those crates packaged alright!
Good luck kid, you'll be doing this till your debt is paid off.
